item.description:
Some details for the event. 

Admission is $10 per adult, parking is free, tickets can be purchased at the gate.

These are the scheduled events going on between 4 and 10pm. 

04:00 – 09:00 Cruise-In - Corvettes, Classics and Modern Muscle Car Show

04:00 - 06:00 PAWS—Pawtucket Red Sox Mascot signs autographs and photos

04:30 Flying Pigs – (New + free all weekend) – Midway

05:30  Weather Briefing

05:30 High Flying Pages Trapeze Act (Free all weekend) – Midway

06:30 Flying Pigs – (New + free all weekend) – Midway

07:00 Hot Air Balloons fly (weather permitting) + Tethered Balloon Rides begin

Dusk Hot Air Balloon Glow with music by Sergei

09:00 FIREWORKS! With music by Sergei

 

The tethered balloon rides cost $15.  Untethered balloon rides are available as well.  Cost is determined by length of flight and wind direction, and the pilots will let you you know the cost before you fly.   In general balloon flights that i've priced from private companies are $175-200 per person. The balloon flights are first come first serve and you need to be available after the weather briefing. 

 Here is the link for the event http://www.wakefieldrotary.com, if you want to look up more information.  I  will send my phone number closer to the event so we can meet up at the fairgrounds. 

 

DIRECTIONS

 

The Festival is located at the URI Athletic fields
off Route 138 in Kingston RI.

 

GPS USERS: enter the following address

3 KEANEY ROAD

KINGSTON, RI 02881

 

Directions from Providence and points North:


Take I - 95 South to Exit 9 (A left-hand exit from the passing lane). Take Exit 9 on to Route 4 - South. After traveling 10.4 miles, Route 4 joins with Route 1. Follow Route 1 South to the Route 138 four-way intersection (the fire tower will be at your left). Take a right onto 138 West and follow the signs!

• To avoid any beach traffic, take I - 95 to Route 4 to the 102 West Exit. Travel 1 mile on 102 and turn left onto Route 2. Follow Route 2 to 138 East and watch for festival signs!

 

From Wakefield and points South:


Take Route 1 North to the Route 138 four-way intersection. Take a left onto 138 West and follow the signs!

 

From Connecticut:


Take I - 95 North to Exit 3A (Sign -- "Route 138 East, University of Rhode Island"). Take Route 138 East and watch for the signs after Route 2!
item.why: It will be really cool to see all the balloons ascend as well as watch kites fly, listen to music, gorge on fair food, go on some rides and just have a great day overall. Ill update with more details as July gets closer.
item.name: Attend the Hot Air Balloon Festival
